comprehensive_overview: MATLAB Compiler Runtime (MCR) is a standalone set of shared libraries that enables the execution of MATLAB files or applications, without having MATLAB installed. It allows end-users to run applications compiled with MATLAB Compiler or deploy MATLAB algorithms as Excel add-ins and web applications.
core_features: Enables execution of MATLAB applications without MATLAB installed
Supports deployment of MATLAB algorithms as Excel add-ins and web applications
Provides support for running compiled MATLAB files
